root.name: Railworks 3: Train Simulator 2012
root.description: Train Simulator 2012 is the sequel to the award winning RailWorks 2, based on the new TSX game engine®. Train Simulator 2012 is the most realistic train simulator in the world, with the best graphics and sound available, along with a wide range of quality content and optional add‐ ons, plus modelling tools to allow you to make your own rail environment.
